title: Science Concept Simulation Learning Design Considering the Expertise Reversal Effect

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement program for pre-service/in-service teachers. Utilizes smartphone-based VR simulations and measures conceptual application skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy through instructional material design based on cognitive load theory.
Learners can select appropriate visual/textual supplementary materials tailored to their proficiency level (beginner/intermediate) to improve learning efficiency by 20%.
Learners can reproduce scientific problem-solving processes step-by-step using VR simulations and demonstrate conceptual transfer through project outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
